import React, { Component } from "react"; import axios from "../../../axios"; export default class ViewModal extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { stock_data: {Notes: "", Stock_id: "000665", Pur_Agmt: "PA201903-0051", pur_type: "NB", Pur_dt: "3/13/2019 12:00:00 AM", Cal_Period: "201903", status: "Y", OrderStatus: "P", MiscSt: "O", PAAccountStatus: "P", PE: "", Layoff_St: "O", FSt: "O", Pur_slsm: "COMPANY", branch_code: "", Pur_Ref: "", Location: "", Pur_Inv: "2019-000578", VenInv: "E0262-02", Pur_invdt: "3/13/2019 12:00:00 AM", TrueCost: "30987.20", AgrCost: "30987.20", HP_comp: "", FsCost: "0.00", Pur_deldt: "3/13/2019 12:00:00 AM", Pur_deltm: "00:00:00", EntryStaff: "AMY", EntryDate: "3/14/2019 4:30:01 PM", LastAddEditStaff: "AMY", LastAddEditDate: "3/14/2019 4:30:01 PM", GST_mtd: "SR", CalGstYN: "", gst_pur: "2027.2", gst_sell: "2410.6800", gstpct_pur: "7.0000", paCOE: "", paPARF: "", paVEHCOST: "28960.00", paOTHERS: "", paCOSTVALUE: "28960.00", paGST: "2027.20", TRAN_FEE: "0.0000", InsAmt: "0.00", InspectionDate: "", AssignTo: "", PARefSource: "", PAReferer: "", Layoff_Dt: "", paOCOE: "", paOPARF: "", paOVEHCOST: "28960.00", paOOTHERS: "", paOCOSTVALUE: "28960.00", paOGST: "2027.20", PaExchangeRate: "1.0000000000", PaOrigCurrency: "S$", Local: "C", Ic_no: "201802742Z", Name: "EXCLUSIVE IMPORTS PTE LTD", BCountry: "", Addr1: "60 JALAN LAM HUAT ", Addr2: "#05-25, CARROS CENTRE ", Addr3: "SINGAPORE 737869 ", ContactPerson: "JASON POH", HirerCode: "EX00000", Dob: "", Sex: "", Phone4: "87868999", Phone1: "", phone2: "", phone5: "", Nationality: "", Email: "exclusiveimportsg@gmail.com", Married: "", Race: "", Drv_dt: "", Service: "0.00", ServiceMonth: "0", BankNo: "", Drv_exp: "0", BankAcct: "", Reg_no: "001299", Rev: "001", Veh_type: "C", Veh_Class: "PASSENGER", New_used: "N", Owner: "0", Year: "2018", make: "HONDA", model: "SHUTTLE 1.5G A", propell: "PETROL", OReg_Dt: "", Engine_No: "L15B6001598", chasis_no: "GK82001299", COL_CODE: "GREY", Coe_amt: "0", Coe_dt: "", Coe_Year: "0", Rdtax_amt: "0", Rdtax_dt: "", Omv: "20064", Mileage: "", Capacity: "1496", COE_Renew_Dt: "", Coe_Num: "", ArfPct: "20090.00", Parf_dt: "", Parf_amt: "0", Laden: "0", Unladen: "0", Reg_dt: "", Optionals: "", BodyType: "", VehicleDesc: "", Reg_No: "001299"} }; this.submitHandler = this.submitHandler.bind(this); this.changeHandler = this.changeHandler.bind(this); } componentDidMount() { axios .get("/api/values/purchaseDetails/" + this.props.match.params.id) .then(response => { if (response.data) this.setState({ stock_data: response.data }); console.log(response.data); }) .catch(error => console.log(error)); } submitHandler(e) { e.preventDefault(); this.setState({ stock_id: e.target.stock_id }); } changeHandler(e) { const value = e.target.value; this.setState(prevState => ({ stock_data:{ ...prevState.stock_data, [e.target.name]: e.target.value } })); } render() { return ( <>

Stock: {this.state.stock_data.Pur_Agmt}

{this.state.stock_data ? (
) : ( "Loading..." )} ); } }
